description:
Sorry "Vampire Diaries" fans, Ian Somerhalder is off the market. E! news reports "multiple sources" confirm to the outlet the actor and girlfriend Nikki Reed are engaged after only six months of dating. 《吸血鬼日记》的粉丝们，抱歉，Ian Somerhalder已经有主了。E!news 报道，多位知情人士同时确认，Ian Somerhalder和女友Nikki Reed在相恋6个月之后订婚！

The couple's relationship has seemed to have been moving fast since it started in July. Reed reportedly is a frequent fixture on "The Vampire Diaries" set and the two have adopted several animals together, including a horse and a kitten. 这对恋人的恋情发展速度相当快，两人去年7月才展开恋情。据报道，Reed经常去《吸血鬼日记》剧组探班，他们还一起领养了很多小动物，包括一匹马和一只猫。

The news comes soon after Reed's marriage of two years to "American Idol" alum Paul McDonald was finalized. Somerhalder previously dated his "TVD" co-star Nina Dobrev for at least two years. 他们订婚的消息在Reed和《美国偶像》男星Paul McDonald确认离婚后不久就发出。Somerhalder之前曾经和《吸血鬼日记》女主Nina Dobrev相恋两年。

title: 《吸血鬼日记》Ian Somerhalder订婚
